```{r, echo=TRUE, warning=FALSE, message=FALSE}
library(dplyr)
set.seed(123)
num_samples <- 200   
num_features <- 100
num_anomalies <- 10  
features <- matrix(rnorm(num_samples * num_features, mean = 0, sd = 1), 
                   nrow = num_samples, ncol = num_features)
result <- runif(num_samples, min = -10, max = 10)  

# Select 10 anomaly indices
anomaly_indices <- sample(1:num_samples, num_anomalies, replace = FALSE)

# Introduce anomalies
for (idx in anomaly_indices) {
  anomaly_features <- sample(1:num_features, size = sample(5:15, 1), replace = FALSE)  # 5â€“15 features are modified
  features[idx, anomaly_features] <- features[idx, anomaly_features] + 
    rnorm(length(anomaly_features), mean = 15, sd = 5)
  result[idx] <- result[idx] + rnorm(1, mean = 10, sd = 2)  # adjust result value
}

# Create data frame 
data <- as.data.frame(features)
data$Result <- result  # add result column

# Save dataset to CSV in the current working directory
write.csv(data, "Synthetic_High-Dimensional_Time_Series_Data.csv", row.names = FALSE)

# Output anomaly indices
print(sort(anomaly_indices))
```
